q: Michael Vick has done sitdowns with each of the networks that cover the NFL, but clearly his story is about more than football. CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call. "It's time for him to have a shot at running this." Larry Page hailed Eric Schmidt as a "tremendous leader" whose contributions exceeded all expectations. There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done, Larry Page said. Although he tried to debunk the idea, Eric Schmidt may have been growing weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinised companies.
